txt.en: 'The Nêpharai have begun to build out their settlement in Harkhaphâr. The Nêpharai were perpetrators of a most foul betrayal injuring many of those whom called this camp home. They attempted to destroy this place, and continue to hunt our people. We are left with little choice but to ask for your aid in driving them out.\n\n'Search the camp and thin the Nêpharai numbers in an attempt to push them elsewhere in the catacombs.'
Return to Bâkhadir located just north of Harkhaphâr and inform him of your deeds.
Talk to Bâkhadir outside of Harkhaphâr

To the south, the Nêpharai have made a small encampment known as Harkhaphâr. The Nêpharai broke away from Hulzidâr, killing several inhabitants and pillaging the camp as they fled. Seek out the Nêpharai and weaken their numbers.
'I wish this bloodshed could have been avoided, but after attacking many of those who call Hulzidâr home, we had to weaken them so they pose less of a threat to us.'
Seek out the Nêpharai and weaken their numbers before they pose a greater threat to the camp.
